name: whirlcrypt
description: Whirlcrypt - Secure file sharing with RFC 8188 encryption

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.security:audit: npm run security:audit:backend && npm run security:audit:frontend
scripts.security:full: npm run security:audit && npm run security:licenses
scripts.security:licenses: cd backend && npm run security:licenses && cd ../frontend && npm run security:licenses
